org.openintents.tools.simulator

类 SensorSimulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openintents.tools.simulator.SensorSimulator

  • public class SensorSimulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Class of SensorSimulator. The SensorSimulator is a Java stand-alone application. It simulates various sensors. An Android application can connect through TCP/IP with the settings shown to the SensorSimulator to simulate accelerometer, compass, orientation sensor, and thermometer. SensorSimulator is a container that keeps all the components of the SensorSimulator: the model, the view and the controller.
    作者:
    ilarele
